entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 3.
